arts.ttl: Late Fiacre Kelleher goal sees Colchester beat Port Vale to boost play-off hopes
Colchester United winger Kyreece Lisbie joins National League side on loan
arts.sum: He said: “Kyreece is a young player that we think has got an awful lot of potential. Speaking last month, Colchester boss Danny Cowley said Lisbie is a young player with lots of potential.

arts.ttl: FAN'S VIEW: Colchester United are proving to be the pit bull that bites back
arts.sum: Vale are another team that started the season well, but have fallen off the pace in recent games. The reason I'm bringing this up is that little old Colchester have had a reputation over the last few seasons as being nice to play against.

arts.ttl: Former Colchester United duo lead Young Socceroos to historic Asian Cup success
arts.sum: Morgan scored a penalty in Colchester's final game of the season against Burnley at Layer Road, their last Football League goal for two seasons. Socceroos head coach Trevor Morgan and assistant Richard Garcia presided over their victory, achieved after they prevailed in a nail-biting penalty shootout against Saudi Arabia in the final at Bao’an Sports Centre Stadium, Shenzhen.

arts.ttl: Preview: Colchester United vs. Port Vale - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League Two clash between Colchester United and Port Vale, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
